metadata.synopsis: You come upon the myconid guards. They warn the sovereign of your presence teleapthically, and it begins to speak to you. This should be creepy, hallucinatory.
metadata.how_to_trigger: goto 29 -127Walk toward the Myconid guards up on the cliff area as illustrated.Cinematic will trigger as you get close

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *You are swallowed by a chorus of frenzied music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of a myconid collective.*

26.speaker: Restless Myconid
26.text: ((*Sovereign. they have come. the Rot has come*))

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *The fright-choir fades. A single melody rises above the others, brassy and commanding.*

40.speaker: GROUP_UND_MyconidSovereign
40.text: ((*I am Sovereign. and you are duergar. you are Rot*))

1.speaker: GROUP_UND_MyconidSovereign
1.text: ((*I am Sovereign. and you bring the Rot. duergar*))

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *You see a vision: your lifeless body, wrapped in fungal tendrils. The sovereign is threatening you.*

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Conjure tranquil memories in hopes of calming the sovereign.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Kneel in submission. My duergar companion means you no harm.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: If I wanted you dead, you would be. Don't tempt me.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: As if you could even graze me. Stand down.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *You are swallowed by a chorus of turbulent music. Through one creature sing many voices: the harmony of an entire collective.*

48.speaker: Restless Myconid
48.text: ((*Sovereign. they have come. they are here*))

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *The choir fades. A single melody rises above the others, brassy and commanding.*

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *You see a vision: your lifeless body, wrapped in fungal tendrils. The sovereign is threatening you.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player closes eyes as if seeing the vision in their head.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I sense your fear. I've come to aid you.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Focus on your parasite and connect with the sovereign.

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *The parasite is quiet. You feel no bond with the creature.*

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I am a traveller seeking adventure.

10.speaker: Narrator
10.text: *Fungal roots weave through your mind, seeking your true intent.*
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player closes eyes as if to see the vision.

70.speaker: Narrator
70.text: *Then the sovereign drones a new melody, cautious but welcoming.*
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overhead view, as sovereign is not in sight range.

50.speaker: GROUP_UND_MyconidSovereign
50.text: ((*I can mend neither skin nor spirit. but we still might commune*))

14.speaker: GROUP_UND_MyconidSovereign
14.text: ((*descend to me. let us speak in flesh*))
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overhead view, as sovereign is not in sight range. (Custom cameras required)

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: *The persistent music coaxes you forward. The sovereign expects you.*

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *Fungal roots weave through your mind, poking you, warning you...*

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Seek understanding. Focus on the sovereign's song.

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: *You detect a distinct quiver in every note. These creatures have experienced recent tragedy.*

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *You discern no information or intention in the sovereign's song.*

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Counter with your own memory. Duergar builders, not burners. Not rot.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: My purpose is private. Let me pass, and I will leave you unharmed.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Never you mind. Stand down, or be knocked down.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: The Underdark is my home - I don't need your permission to pass.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Hum a peaceful tune in harmony with the sovereign.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I have no 'purpose'. I simply am. That is enough.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: These tricks of the mind don't frighten me - I'll kill you!

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Let me pass. I've come for the runaway gnome.

57.speaker: Restless Myconid
57.text: ((*the Sovereign spoke its word. you will obey*))
